## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r question1, echo = TRUE}
download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip", "data-activity.zip")
unzip("data-activity.zip", exdir = "DATA")
activity <- read.csv("./DATA/activity.csv", header = TRUE)
activity$date <- as.Date(as.character(activity$date), "%Y-%m-%d")
```
## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r question2, echo = TRUE}
tapply(activity$steps, activity$date, FUN = sum, na.rm = TRUE)

mean(tapply(activity$steps, activity$date, FUN = sum, na.rm = TRUE), na.rm = TRUE)
median(tapply(activity$steps, activity$date, FUN = sum, na.rm = TRUE), na.rm = TRUE)
```
